titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the venting and transporting of the cloth and wollen manufactures of this kingdome.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, printed to the University,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at our court at Oxford, this twenty first day of November, in the nineteenth yeare of our raigne.
Arms 37; Steele notation: and of first.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
